title: A Study of Topiramate Augmentation in Serotonin Reuptake Inhibitor (SRI) -Refractory Obsessive Compulsive Disorder

operands.value: Outpatient with primary DSM- IV OCD

Completion of a 14-week open label trial of one the following SRI's: fluoxetine 80 mg/day, paroxetine 60 mg/day, fluvoxamine 300 mg/day, clomipramine 250 mg/day, sertraline 200 mg/day, citalopram 60 mg/day, escitalopram 30 mg/day and demonstrating a non or partial responses to SRI treatment (CGI-I of 3 or 4, Y-BOCS reduction of < 35%)
Stable (8 wks or longer) concurrent medications including benzodiazepines, sedative hypnotics, antipsychotics, and antidepressants.
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 65 Years
DSM-IV criteria for body dysmorphic disorder
DSM-IV criteria for bipolar affective disorder
A previous adequate trial of topiramate
Comorbid major depressive disorder diagnosis which predates OCD diagnosis
Cognitive behavioural therapy or additional psychotherapy in past four months

symPyExpression: And(Symbol("Completion of a 14-week open label trial of one the following SRI's: fluoxetine 80 mg/day, paroxetine 60 mg/day, fluvoxamine 300 mg/day, clomipramine 250 mg/day, sertraline 200 mg/day, citalopram 60 mg/day, escitalopram 30 mg/day and demonstrating a non or partial responses to SRI treatment (CGI-I of 3 or 4, Y-BOCS reduction of < 35%)"), Symbol('Must have maximum age of 65 Years'), Symbol('Must have minimum age of 18 Years'), Symbol('Outpatient with primary DSM- IV OCD'), Symbol('Stable (8 wks or longer) concurrent medications including benzodiazepines, sedative hypnotics, antipsychotics, and antidepressants.'), Not(Or(Symbol('A previous adequate trial of topiramate'), Symbol('Allergy or hypersensitivity to topiramate'), Symbol('Any other primary DSM-IV diagnosis'), Symbol('BMI < 20'), Symbol('Cognitive behavioural therapy or additional psychotherapy in past four months'), Symbol('Comorbid major depressive disorder diagnosis which predates OCD diagnosis'), Symbol('DSM-IV criteria for bipolar affective disorder'), Symbol('DSM-IV criteria for body dysmorphic disorder'), Symbol('DSM-IV criteria for psychotic disorder'), Symbol('DSM-IV criteria for schizophrenia'), Symbol('History of kidney stones'), Symbol('current alcohol/substance abuse'))))
